tool.name: editElement

param.name: Target_Metadata
param.dialogReference: This should be the full path to a standalone XML metadata document or a dataset with an existing metadata document that you wish to edit.

param.name: Xpath_Expression
param.dialogReference:
This should be an XPath expression matching the element you intend to edit. Do not include the root /metadata element, start one level below that. As an example, the correct XPath to update the publication date is

dataIdInfo/idCitation/date/pubdate

This tool has not been tested with XPaths that use namespaces or complex XPaths.

param.name: New_Value
param.dialogReference: This should be the text value you wish to place in the XPath specified above.

tool.summary: This tool accepts an XML XPath expression and a text value to update just a single element. If the element does not exist, it will be added. Please be aware that the source metadata will be changed - make a backup copy if necessary.
